title: GE Appliances Employee Evaluation Dashboard
description: Internal tool that ingests two-week timesheet CSV files and produces actionable performance insights through KPI cards, sortable data tables, and accessible charts.

pages.name: Landing
pages.purpose: Minimalist entry point with prominent GE-blue upload button and progress feedback

pages.name: Dashboard
pages.purpose: KPI cards, sortable employee table, and synchronized charts for workforce analytics

pages.name: Reports
pages.purpose: Print-optimized, paginated view for generating individual PDF evaluations

ui_components: Inline error alert with downloadable error log
Sortable data table with sticky headers & keyboard nav
Off-canvas help panel with keyboard shortcuts
state: kpis: workforce totals, averages, overtime count
acceptance_criteria: Upload button styled #005CB9 with white Nunito-Sans label
CSV required columns validated: employee_id, name, date, clock_in, clock_out
Duplicates flagged with downloadable error log
Metrics calculated: total hrs, avg daily hrs, days worked, punctuality, overtime flag
KPI cards show workforce totals, averages, overtime count
Table sortable, sticky headers, row hover, keyboard nav
Charts use GE palette with pattern fills & 200% zoom labels
Aria-labels bilingual en/es, WCAG 2.2 AA focus outlines
Keyboard shortcuts documented in off-canvas help
